name: ROLLING RASCAL - The Surreal Steal
description:
CONTROLS:

W / S -- rotate up / down

A / D -- rotate left / right

ARROW KEYS -- move

SPACE -- release to jump (hold to charge)

Q -- drop loot

E -- spawn hideout

WIN CONDITION:

Collect all 4 items in your hideout.

notes:

there's a bug where the collision does not work and you get teleported out of bounds and get destroyed, and the game does not restart. If this happened to you, sorry!, and restart the page with F5.

made with Unreal Engine 4.23.1

assets used:

- the barely functional plants are from "Dynamic Grass System Lite"

SOUND & MUSIC: habian666 (Fabian Gimpel)

3D MODELING: Leonie Heidel

3D MODELING & ILLUSTRATION: Kaikoura (Sven Mehlhorn)

PROGRAMMING, SHADING & LEVEL DESIGN: yonn (Jonas Kim Rühl)
